author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Adding branch split level to the output of `edmDumpEventContent --all` helped to figure out https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43923#issuecomment-2215275010 . 

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/946

#### PR validation:

The printout of `edmDumpEventContent --all` includes the added information
title: Include branch split level in `edmDumpEventContent --all`
